errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.forbidden: Access denied. You do not have permission to perform this action.
errors.validationFailed: Please check your input and try again.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: Please provide a valid email address
errors.invalidPhone: Please provide a valid phone number with country code (e.g., +216-51-532-499)
errors.fullNameTooShort: Full name must be at least 2 characters long
errors.fullNameTooLong: Full name must not exceed 100 characters
errors.companyNameTooShort: Company name must be at least 2 characters long
errors.companyNameTooLong: Company name must not exceed 100 characters
errors.yearsOfExperienceInvalid: Years of experience must be a valid number
errors.yearsOfExperienceTooHigh: Years of experience must not exceed 50 years
errors.areaOfExpertiseTooShort: Area of expertise must be at least 10 characters long
errors.areaOfExpertiseTooLong: Area of expertise must not exceed 500 characters
errors.fileUploadFailed: File upload failed. Please try again
errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a supported file format (PDF, DOC, DOCX, PNG, JPG)
errors.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds maximum allowed limit
errors.fileSizeLimit: File size exceeds the maximum limit
errors.duplicateRequest: A demo request with this email already exists
errors.duplicateRequestWithId: A demo request already exists for this email
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many demo requests. Please try again later
errors.rateLimitWithRetry: Too many requests. Please wait before trying again
errors.emailSendFailed: Failed to send notification email. Your request was saved successfully
errors.processingFailed: Failed to process demo request. Please try again
errors.unauthorizedAccess: You are not authorized to access this demo request

success.businessRequestSubmitted: We’ve received your request! Our team will contact you soon to schedule a meeting and discuss how Coachini can support your business goals
success.coachRequestSubmitted: We’ve received your request! Our team will contact you soon to schedule a meeting and discuss how Coachini can support your business goals

suggestions.duplicateRequest: Please use a different email address or contact support if you need to update your existing request
suggestions.rateLimitExceeded: Please wait a few minutes before submitting another request
suggestions.invalidPhone: Phone numbers should include country code, e.g., +216-51-532-499 for Tunisia
suggestions.fileUploadFailed: Please check your file format and size, then try uploading again
suggestions.fileTooLarge: Please reduce your file size or compress the file before uploading
suggestions.invalidFileType: Please upload files in PDF, DOC, DOCX, PNG, or JPG format only
suggestions.emailSendFailed: Your request was saved successfully, but we couldn't send the confirmation email. You may contact support if needed
